teaser: Airing on Tuesday, February 3, 2015: First up on today's show, Greece's firebreathing new finance minister goes to meet his critics. Plus, we'll talk to Ron Lieber, the personal finance columnist for The New York Times, about his new book that aims to teach parents how to raise financially responsible kids.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, February 3, 2015
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, February 3, 2015
description: Airing on Tuesday, February 3, 2015: First up on today's show, Greece's firebreathing new finance minister goes to meet his critics. Plus, we'll talk to Ron Lieber, the personal finance columnist for The New York Times, about his new book that aims to teach parents how to raise financially responsible kids.
byline: David Brancaccio, Nova Safo, Nancy Marshall-Genzer and Annie Baxter
